about_the_game:
AI Captioning Platform Expanding the Possibilities of Streaming

LiveCap is a next-generation AI captioning platform that delivers your voice to the world. With cutting-edge voice recognition technology, your spoken words are instantly converted into accurate captions, significantly enhancing viewer immersion. You can keep your native language or enable one-click real-time translation to English. This makes seamless communication with viewers across borders a reality.

Complete integration with OBS dramatically improves your streaming quality with professional caption overlays! Additionally, VRChat users will love the OSC speech bubble feature that enriches communication in virtual spaces. The platform also includes functionality to easily generate SRT files from recorded videos, streamlining your post-stream editing workflow.

🚀 Four Innovative Technologies Supporting Professional Streaming

  • Professional Real-time Captioning: Your spoken words appear as high-precision captions within seconds. Deliver your content completely to viewers with hearing impairments

  • Global Streaming Support: Real-time translation from your native language to English reaches viewers worldwide. Build communities that transcend language barriers

  • Streamlined Video Editing Workflow: Generate professional SRT caption files with one click from recorded content. Dramatically reduce caption editing time

  • Seamless OBS Integration: No complex setup required. The LiveCap and OBS partnership lets you immediately implement easily customizable caption overlays

🌐 Speech Bubble Features Enriching the VRChat World

  • Real-time Speech Bubble Display: VRChat OSC integration makes your words pop up in real-time above your character's head. Dramatically enhance your self-expression in virtual spaces

  • Communication Revolution: Visualizing speech expands the range of communication in VR spaces, enabling smooth interaction with users who speak different languages

  • Enhanced Immersion: By conveying not just voice but also text, your presence in VR spaces is amplified, creating deeper roleplay and social experiences

⚠️ System Requirements and Notes

  • Recommended Environment: GPU with 12GB+ VRAM - For optimal performance

  • Please test with the trial version before purchasing - Check system compatibility

Take your streaming quality to the next level. Unleash the power of words with LiveCap! Try the trial version first to experience its innovative features!

short_description: LiveCap is a subtitle generation platform powered by cutting-edge AI technology. This software delivers accurate, real-time subtitles during live broadcasts. In addition to displaying subtitles in your native language, it is capable of translating them into English in real time.
supported_languages: English, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
